item.description:
6:00 - 7:00 PM Meet and Greet
7:01 - 8:00 PM Hal Shurtleff
8:01 - 9:00 PM Dave Kopaz
9:01 Final Wrap

Join Hal Shurtleff and Dave Kopacz for this crucial seminar at the:

Ward II Social Club
1-3 East Collins Street
Salem , MA 01970

Sustainable development, smart growth and stretch energy are poisoning our property rights. Learn how to fight this in your town.

Learn what ICLEI is and how to stop them the way countless communities across the county have.

Go here for an Introduction to Agenda 21 and ICLEI: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TzEEgtOFFlM

Sponsored by the Cape Ann Tea Party, Lynn Tea Party, North Shore Tea Party and Essex County Tea Party
item.name: Agenda 21 Educational Seminar
